item.title: 科研画图
item.author: miaomiaoyangyxy@gmail.com (MiaoMiaoYang)
item.description: matlibplot 限制画布范围 只显示一定区域的图像，超出这个区域的图像不进行绘制 1 2 plt.xlim(xmin=-30,xmax=30) plt.ylim(ymin=-30,ymax=30) 网格 1 plt.grid(True) 箭头 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 plt.arrow(x=0, y=0, dx=2, dy=-1,width=0.005,head_width=0.1,ec='r',fc='r') plt.arrow(x=0, y=0, dx=-1, dy=2,width=0.005,head_width=0.1,ec='r',fc='r') plt.xlim(xmin=-3,xmax=3) plt.ylim(ymin=-3,ymax=3) plt.grid(True) plt.show() 也可以使用在标注过
item.dc:creator: MiaoMiaoYang

item.title: Hugo
item.author: miaomiaoyangyxy@gmail.com (MiaoMiaoYang)
item.description: Math Support (KaTex) 几乎所有的Hugo添加Math支持都是如下四部： Create a partial under /layouts/partials/math.html 这个/layouts/partials/math.html一般在主题当中就有

item.title: Dockerfile
item.author: miaomiaoyangyxy@gmail.com (MiaoMiaoYang)
item.description: 编写Dockerfile FROM 定制的镜像都是基于FROM镜像的，所以需要找一个基础镜像 1 2 3 4 ## 基础镜像 FROM pytorch/pytorch:latest ## 维护者信息 LABEL maintainer "MiaoMiaoYang" RUN RUN 相当于在容器中
item.dc:creator: MiaoMiaoYang

item.title: TensorboardX

item.description: 参考资料 https://blog.csdn.net/bigbennyguo/article/details/87956434 https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/37022051 创建TensorBoardX 1 2 3 4 from tensorboardX import SummaryWriter writer = SummaryWriter('runs/exp') writer = SummaryWriter() writer = SummaryWriter(comment='resnet') 三种方式初始化TensorBoardX，创建SummaryWrit
item.dc:creator: MiaoMiaoYang
